data.title: Where to watch the CONMEBOL Copa América 2024™?
data.meta_description: How to watch the 32 matches in Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, United States, Jamaica, Mexico, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Uruguay and Venezuela.
data.text:
Over 192 countries will be able to enjoy all the matches of the oldest national team tournament in the world.

There will be 32 matches being played between June 20 and July 14.

The 48th edition of the CONMEBOL Copa America™ will be a televised global event thanks to agreements with more than 43 media outlets.

"Our purpose is to make the whole world feel the greatness and passion of the CONMEBOL Copa América 2024™, which is why, hand in hand with our commercial team, we have consolidated deals throughout the world to ensure that over 192 countries can closely follow the oldest and most exciting tournament of nations in the American continent," said Alejandro Domínguez, CONMEBOL's president.

It is worth noting that, as part of the strategy to ensure that the CONMEBOL Copa América 2024™ is broadcast worldwide, the Confederation's commercial team has sealed agreements that allow this tournament to have, so far, a global coverage of 94%.

Where to watch the CONMEBOL Copa América 2024™

Argentina: Telefe, Directv, TyC, TVP.

Bolivia: Unitel, Entel, Digital TV, COMTECO, TUVES HD SATELITAL, COTEOR.

Brazil: TV Globo, SporTV.

Canada: RDS, TSN, TSN+.

Chile: Canal 13, Chilevisión, DirecTV.

Colombia: Caracol TV, RCN, DirecTV, Win Sports.

Costa Rica: Teletica, Repretel, TDMAX, TD+.

Ecuador: TV Ecuavisa, DirecTV.

Jamaica: CVM, CVM+.

Mexico: Canal 5, TUDN, VIX, TV Azteca.

Panama: RPC, TVN, TVMAX.

Paraguay: Trece, SNT, Telefuturo, Tigo Sports.

Peru: América TV, DirecTV.

United States: Univision, Unimas, TUDN, Fox, FS1, FS2

Uruguay: DirecTV, TV Ciudad.

Venezuela: Televen.

Rest of the world:

Indonesia: Indosiar

Vietnam: tvN SPORTS, CH Success, Leestar TV

South Korea: Vingsports, tvN SPORTS, Leestar TV

China and Macau: CCTV

China (exc. Hong Kong, Taiwan, Macau): CSM

Hong Kong: HoyTv Sports.

Japan: Prime Video, Soccer King, Sports Navi, Ultra Soccer

Fiji: FBC

Malaysia: Astro

India, Bagladesh, Butan, Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan, Sri Lanka: Tsports

East Timor: ETO Telco

Singapore: Starhub

Spain: Movistar Plus+

Portugal: Sport TV Portugal

Denmark, Finland, Norway, Poland, Belgium and the Netherlands: Viaplay Group

Israel: TV Charlton Limited

Sweden: AB

Russia and Belarus: Okko

Slovenia: Arena Sport Slovenia

Croatia: HD Win Arenasport

Romania: Digi Sports

Ukraine: MEGOGO

Georgia and Uzbekistan: Sentana

Bulgaria: A1

France and its dominions (indlucing Monaco, Andorra and French Guiana): L'Equipe

Greece and Cyprus: ANT1 TV

Germany, Austria and Switzerland: Sportdigital FUSSBALL

Italy, San Marino and Vatican City: Sport Italia

UK and Ireland: Premier Sports

Africa: Canal+

Australia: Optus Sport
